typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Company CR #} as string,
		{Company Transaction Type Arabic } as string,
		{Company Transaction Type English } as string,
		{Company Transaction type} as string,
		{PSMS - MoCI Transaction Types} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['*.xlsx']) ~> crtrtypexlsx
source(output(
		ID_TRANSACTION_TYPE as integer,
		DS_TRANSACTION_TYPE as string,
		DS_EFFECT as string,
		DS_TYPE_CODE as string,
		DS_TYPE_DESC_ENG as string,
		DS_TYPE_DESC_ARB as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: '\nSELECT id_transaction_type,ds_transaction_type FROM DWH.DWL_TRANSACTION_TYPE where id_transaction_type>18 ORDER BY 1',
	format: 'query',
	staged: true) ~> source2
crtrtypexlsx join({PSMS - MoCI Transaction Types} == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
